title: Embodied Sensorimotor Integration Teaching Method Design for Neurodiverse Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Neurodiversity Education Basics, Embodied Cognition Theory, and Adult Learning Principles
context.additional_context: VR/simulation-based activity design in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, emphasizing practical educational applications for working professionals.

learning_goals: Three or more embodied teaching methods can be proposed to integrate sensory-motor stimulatory (stimming) behaviors of neurodiverse learners into the learning process
A VR implementation plan for activities similar to Balance Board Math can be designed in a simulated environment
Five heuristic principles for inclusive instructional design can be applied to actual educational scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
